name: Stylishier Greasemonkey status icon
description:
Modification for Greasemonkey (https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/748) status bar icon.  Icons are grayscaled and tightened to best suit the GrApple (http://www.takebacktheweb.org/) themes.

2009.06.12: FIXED disabled icon is now actually grayscaled. [156] 
2009.03.15: Initial release.
